regexCodeList.string: ^You don't have a component like that.$
^(.*)\[ALERT\]\: EMERGENCY COPYOVER \- Keep calm\, we might pull through(.*)$
^Where to begin? It all looks so complex...$
^You step away from (.*), and realize you've done it all wrong...$
^Where to begin\? It all looks so complex(.*)$
^(.*) beckons for you to come over to (.*).$
^You don't see a ship like that nearby to work on.$

Script.name: LotJBuildship2
Script.script:
lotj = lotj or {} lotj.buildShip = lotj.buildShip or {} lotj.global = lotj.global or {}
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysLoadEvent", waitToInit)
local function waitToInit() tempTimer(5,[[lotj.buildShip.Init]]) end
function lotj.buildShip.SetParts() lotj.buildShip.Parts = lotj.buildShip.Parts or { hull = "hull", circuits = "circuits", weapons = "weapons", engines = "engines"} end
function lotj.buildShip.ClearVars() lotj.buildShip.Queue = {} lotj.buildShip.Parts = lotj.buildShip.Parts or { hull = "hull", circuits = "circuits", weapons = "weapons", engines = "engines"} lotj.buildShip.CurrPos = 1 lotj.buildShip.CurrShip = "" lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = "" lotj.buildShip.Spam = false lotj.buildShip.Auto = false end
function lotj.buildShip.Init() lotj.buildShip.Queue = {} lotj.buildShip.CurrPos = 1 lotj.buildShip.CurrShip = "" lotj.buildShip.Spam = false lotj.buildShip.AntiLoop = 0 lotj.buildShip.metaAntiLoop = 0 lotj.buildShip.SetParts() cecho("<green>LotjBuildShip Initialized.<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.Clear() lotj.buildShip.ClearVars() cecho("<yellow>Buildship variables cleared.<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.FirstInit() lotj.buildShip.ClearVars() lotj.buildShip.Init() cecho("<green>LotJBuildship Initialized.<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.Add(matches) local queueLength = #lotj.buildShip.Queue local bsNewShip = tostring(matches[2]) lotj.buildShip.Queue[queueLength + 1] = tostring(bsNewShip) cecho("<green>"..bsNewShip.." added to queue!<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.Remove(matches) local bsRemove = matches[2] if type(bsRemove) == number then -- We're deleting based on index. table.remove(tonumber(bsRemove)) cecho("<yellow>Removed ship at index "..bsRemove.."<reset>
") else for i,v in pairs(lotj.buildShip.Queue) do if string.match(v, bsRemove) then table.remove(lotj.buildShip.Queue, i) cecho("<yellow>Removed entry "..v.."<reset>
") end end end end
function lotj.buildShip.Update(matches) if matches[4] then lotj.buildShip.Finished = string.lower(tostring(matches[4])) else lotj.buildShip.Finished = string.lower(tostring(matches[2])) end for i,v in pairs(lotj.buildShip.Queue) do if string.find(lotj.buildShip.Finished, v) then if i == lotj.buildShip.CurrPos then lotj.buildShip.Next() return else if string.find(lotj.buildShip.Finished, lotj.buildShip.CurrShip) then lotj.buildShip.Next() return else table.remove(lotj.buildShip.Queue, i) cecho("
<green>"..lotj.buildShip.Finished.." complete. Removed from table.<reset>
") return end end end end cecho("<red>"..lotj.buildShip.Finished.." not found in table!<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.Start() lotj.buildShip.CurrPos = 1 lotj.buildShip.CurrShip = lotj.buildShip.Queue[lotj.buildShip.CurrPos] lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull cecho("<green>Beginning ship construction!<reset>
") lotj.buildShip.Auto = false lotj.buildShip.SetAuto() lotj.buildShip.Spam = false lotj.buildShip.GagSpam() lotj.global.AFK = false lotj.buildShip.Botting = gmcp.Char.Info.botting send("get 5 "..lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull) send("buildship "..lotj.buildShip.CurrShip.." "..lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull) end
function lotj.buildShip.Continue() send("buildship "..lotj.buildShip.CurrShip.." "..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) lotj.buildShip.Botting = gmcp.Char.Info.botting end
function lotj.buildShip.GetParts() send("get 5 "..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) lotj.buildShip.Continue() end
function lotj.buildShip.Next() lotj.buildShip.CurrPos = lotj.buildShip.CurrPos+1 if lotj.buildShip.CurrPos > #lotj.buildShip.Queue then lotj.buildShip.Complete() return end send("drop all."..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) lotj.buildShip.CurrShip = lotj.buildShip.Queue[lotj.buildShip.CurrPos] lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull send("get 5 "..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) lotj.buildShip.Continue() end
function lotj.buildShip.NextPart() send("drop all."..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) if lotj.buildShip.CurrPart == lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull then lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = lotj.buildShip.Parts.circuits elseif lotj.buildShip.CurrPart == lotj.buildShip.Parts.circuits then lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = lotj.buildShip.Parts.weapons elseif lotj.buildShip.CurrPart == lotj.buildShip.Parts.weapons then lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = lotj.buildShip.Parts.engines else lotj.buildShip.CurrPart = lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull lotj.buildShip.AntiLoop = lotj.buildShip.AntiLoop+1 if lotj.buildShip.AntiLoop == 2 then lotj.buildShip.metaAntiLoop = lotj.buildShip.metaAntiLoop +1 lotj.buildShip.AntiLoop = 0 if lotj.buildShip.metaAntiLoop == 2 then cecho("<red>Error in changing parts. Aborting.") lotj.buildShip.Complete() return else lotj.buildShip.Next() end end end send("get 5 "..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) lotj.buildShip.Continue() end
function lotj.buildShip.PartName(matches) local buildshipOP = tostring(matches[2]) local buildshipNewPart = tostring(matches[3])
if buildshipOP == "hull" then lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull = buildshipNewPart elseif buildshipOP == "circuits" or buildshipOP == "circuit" then lotj.buildShip.Parts.circuits = buildshipNewPart elseif buildshipOP == "weapons" or buildshipOP == "weapon" then lotj.buildShip.Parts.weapons = buildshipNewPart elseif buildshipOP == "engines" or buildshipOP == "engine" then lotj.buildShip.Parts.engines = buildshipNewPart else cecho("<red>Part name not recognized. Valid parts are hull, circuits, weapons, and engines<reset>
") return end cecho("<green>Key word for "..buildshipOP.." changed to "..buildshipNewPart.."<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.GagSpam() if lotj.buildShip.Spam == false then enableTrigger("BuildshipSpam") cecho("<green>Shipbuilding spam gagged.<reset>
") lotj.buildShip.Spam = true else disableTrigger("BuildshipSpam") cecho("<green>Shipbuilding spam shown.<reset>
") lotj.buildShip.Spam = false end end
function lotj.buildShip.SetAuto() if lotj.buildShip.Auto == false then enableTrigger("Shipbuilding") cecho("<green>Ship construction will continue automatically.<reset>
") lotj.buildShip.Auto = true else disableTrigger("Shipbuilding") cecho("<yellow>Ship construction will not continue.<reset>
") lotj.buildShip.Auto = false end end
function lotj.buildShip.List() if #lotj.buildShip.Queue < 1 then cecho("<yellow>No ships added to buildship queue.<reset>
") return end for i,v in pairs(lotj.buildShip.Queue) do if i == lotj.buildShip.CurrPos then cecho("<white>"..i..": <green>"..v.." <yellow><-
") else cecho("<white>"..i..": <green>"..v.."
") end end end
function lotj.buildShip.ReturnFromAFK() if lotj.global.AFK then send("afk") send("bot start") lotj.buildShip.Botting = true else send("bot start") lotj.buildShip.Botting = true end lotj.buildShip.Continue() end
function lotj.buildShip.Follow(matches) send("follow "..matches[2]) lotj.buildShip.Continue() end
function lotj.buildShip.ShowParts() cecho("<white>Hull : <green>"..lotj.buildShip.Parts.hull.."<reset>
") cecho("<white>Circuits: <green>"..lotj.buildShip.Parts.circuits.."<reset>
") cecho("<white>Weapons : <green>"..lotj.buildShip.Parts.weapons.."<reset>
") cecho("<white>Engines : <green>"..lotj.buildShip.Parts.engines.."<reset>
") end
function lotj.buildShip.Complete() send("drop all."..lotj.buildShip.CurrPart) lotj.buildShip.Spam = true lotj.buildShip.GagSpam() buildAuto = true lotj.buildShip.SetAuto() cecho("<green>Ship construction complete.<reset>
") if lotj.buildShip.Botting == true then send("bot stop") send("afk") end end
function lotj.buildShip.AutoFollow(matches) if lotj.global.AFK then send("afk") send("follow "..matches[2]) send("afk") else send("follow "..matches[2]) lotj.buildShip.Continue() end end
function lotj.buildShip.GroupFollowers() if lotj.global.AFK then send("afk") send("group all") send("afk") else send("group all") lotj.buildShip.Continue() end end
function lotj.buildShip.Help() cecho("<lawn_green>buildadd <ship>- Add a ship to the build queue
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildclear - Clear the ship queue
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildlist - Display the build queue
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildship - Builds current ship
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildstart - Begin building first ship in list
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildnext - Skip to next ship in the list
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildnextpart - Skip to next part in current ship
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildpartname <part name> <new name> - Change the name of a part name to match the item you pick up
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildpartslist - Display the relations between parts and their pickup names
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildauto - Turn automatic building on or off.
") cecho("<lawn_green>buildspam - Turn the build spam filters on or off.
") end

Variable.name: contentResponse
Variable.value: emote $n suddenly narrows his eyes, blinking rapidly as if he's struggling to focus on something unseen. His brow furrows in confusion and frustration, rubbing at his eyes with the heel of his hand. Without warning, the metal plate at the side of his head emits a sharp, audible spark, accompanied by a brief fizzling sound. He flinches slightly at the noise, then, after a moment, his eyes clear, and he looks around calmly, no longer appearing disoriented or blinded by an invisible force.

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: emote $n suddenly narrows his eyes, blinking rapidly as if he's struggling to focus on something unseen. His brow furrows in confusion and frustration, rubbing at his eyes with the heel of his hand. Without warning, the metal plate at the side of his head emits a sharp, audible spark, accompanied by a brief fizzling sound. He flinches slightly at the noise, then, after a moment, his eyes clear, and he looks around calmly, no longer appearing disoriented or blinded by an invisible force.

Variable.name: headacheType
Variable.value: This temporary malfunction should be an expression of impaired vision

Variable.name: insanityType
Variable.value: This temporary insanity should be an expression of delirium.

Variable.name: requestBody
Variable.value: {"temperature":1,"messages":[{"content":"You are an AI assistant providing actions for a sci-fi roleplaying game.","role":"system"},{"content":"Create a scenario involving a male character with a malfunctioning brain implant. Describe the character's action as follows: first, a negative effect occurs; then the implant violently and audibly sparks, indicating an automatic reset. This metal plate is visible and is already known to the observer so can be referred to as 'the metal plate'. After this, the character returns to normal. Focus more on the effect rather than the character hitting the implant to fix it. The action should be in the third person, present tense, and start with 'emote $n'. Use '$n' or pronouns (preferred) for any third-person references following 'emote.' The description should be from an observer's perspective, showing only the character's actions and expressions. Allow the observer to infer why the character is acting this way. The character should not be interacting with props or objects unless they are pulling out an item they carry. The scenario should imply that the character was previously idle, with no indication of ongoing or interrupted activity such as 'stops' or 'stops mid-stride'. Avoid suggesting that the character resumes a previous action or is moving purposefully. The action must conclude within the description. Provide a single, concise example with no semicolons.","role":"user"},{"content":"This temporary malfunction should be an expression of impaired vision","role":"user"}],"model":"gpt-4-turbo-preview"}

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: You are an AI assistant providing actions for a sci-fi roleplaying game.

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: Create a scenario involving a male character with a malfunctioning brain implant. Describe the character's action as follows: first, a negative effect occurs; then the implant violently and audibly sparks, indicating an automatic reset. This metal plate is visible and is already known to the observer so can be referred to as 'the metal plate'. After this, the character returns to normal. Focus more on the effect rather than the character hitting the implant to fix it. The action should be in the third person, present tense, and start with 'emote $n'. Use '$n' or pronouns (preferred) for any third-person references following 'emote.' The description should be from an observer's perspective, showing only the character's actions and expressions. Allow the observer to infer why the character is acting this way. The character should not be interacting with props or objects unless they are pulling out an item they carry. The scenario should imply that the character was previously idle, with no indication of ongoing or interrupted activity such as 'stops' or 'stops mid-stride'. Avoid suggesting that the character resumes a previous action or is moving purposefully. The action must conclude within the description. Provide a single, concise example with no semicolons.

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: This temporary malfunction should be an expression of impaired vision

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: You are an AI assistant providing actions for a sci-fi roleplaying game.

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: Create a scenario involving a male character experiencing a malfunctioning brain implant leading to the temporary insanity. Describe the character's action as follows: first, a negative effect occurs; then the implant violently and audibly sparks, indicating an automatic reset. This metal plate is visible and is already known to the observer so can be referred to as 'the metal plate'. After this, the character returns to normal. Focus more on the effect rather than the character hitting the implant to fix it. The action should be in the third person, present tense, and start with 'emote $n'. Use '$n' or pronouns (preferred) for any third-person references following 'emote.' The description should be from an observer's perspective, showing only the character's actions and expressions. Allow the observer to infer why the character is acting this way. The character should not be interacting with props or objects unless they are pulling out an item they carry. The scenario should imply that the character was previously idle, with no indication of ongoing or interrupted activity such as 'stops' or 'stops mid-stride'. Avoid suggesting that the character resumes a previous action or is moving purposefully. The action must conclude within the description. Provide a single, concise example with no semicolons.

Variable.name: content
Variable.value: This temporary insanity should be an expression of delirium.
